pr_title: [BEAM-9317] Fix portable test executions to specify the beam_fn_api argument

timeline.author: TheNeuralBit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -189,7 +189,6 @@ private DescendantConsumers getRootConsumers(PTransformNode rootNode) {
             + "but transform %s executes in environment %s",
         GreedyPipelineFuser.class.getSimpleName(),
         PTransformTranslation.IMPULSE_TRANSFORM_URN,
-        PTransformTranslation.READ_TRANSFORM_URN,

replies.bodyText: It was some stuff left over in my workspace which I have gotten rid of now.
replies.author: lukecwik

timeline.message:
[BEAM-9317] Fix portable test executions to specify the beam_fn_api argument

This allows for SDK level overrides when executing portable pipelines to occur.
